content.en: Radiation path optimization: Scientists have been exploring the use of various algorithms to optimize walking paths in radioactive environments, such as nuclear facilities and power plants. These algorithms, including particle swarm, RRT*, A*, and ant colony optimization, are being used to find the most efficient paths that minimize radiation exposure. By leveraging the power of these algorithms, researchers aim to improve worker safety and reduce radiation exposure in these hazardous environments.
content.da: Optimering af strålingsveje: Forskere har udforsket brugen af forskellige algoritmer for at optimere gangveje i radioaktive miljøer, såsom nukleare faciliteter og kraftværker. Disse algoritmer, herunder partikelsværm, RRT*, A* og myrekolonioptimering, bliver brugt til at finde de mest effektive veje, der minimerer strålingseksponering. Ved at udnytte kraften i disse algoritmer sigter forskerne mod at forbedre arbejdssikkerheden og reducere strålingseksponeringen i disse farlige miljøer.
